message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I've invested a lot in this product and I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $160 for it.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $150, which is my absolute maximum. If you're not willing to go lower, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand you're really trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I've already compromised a lot. I'm willing to give you a small discount, but I need $165 for it. It's my final offer, so if you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
